segments.text: Good evening , sir . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like to have my coat washed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , please fill in the form first .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's it.By the way when can I get it back ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We will send it to your room at 4:00 pm tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , but I need it tomorrow morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have express service as well . It charges 30 % more but I assure your coat will be ready tomorrow morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's fine . Please send it to my room tomorrow morning .
segments.speaker: S2
